passwordmanager

Class PasswordHash

  • java.lang.Object
    • passwordmanager.PasswordHash

  • public class PasswordHash
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    jayeon PasswordHash provides the first layer of protection by hashing the user's password so that the password is not stored in its raw format. Also, its second method checks whether the password entered at login is identical to the user's password by comparing their respective hashes.
